children.name: FFN
children.description:
For all the numbers

We use a simple feed-forward neural network of multilayer perceptrons to do multinomial logistic regression.

children.name: Data mining
children.description: As we need a rather large amount of data to train our neural networks for them to work satisfactory, we decided to automatically collect repositorys that for each category. To do that, we downloaded a dump of GHTorrent's data and inspected it.
